title: ERC721
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: erc721-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
    - is-subclass-of:: [[BlockchainTechnology]]
	- term-id:: BC-0104
	- preferred-term:: ERC721
	- source-domain:: blockchain
	- status:: active
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: The Ethereum token standard for creating non-fungible tokens (NFTs) where each token has unique identifiers and metadata, enabling verifiable digital ownership of distinct assets.
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: bc:ERC721
	- owl:equivalentClass:: mv:ERC721
	- owl:physicality:: ConceptualEntity
	- owl:role:: Standard
	- belongsToDomain:: [[BlockchainDomain]]

ontology.definition: The Ethereum token standard for creating non-fungible tokens (NFTs) where each token has unique identifiers and metadata, enabling verifiable digital ownership of distinct assets.

errors: Missing required property: is-subclass-of (at least one parent class)
